resources.string:
Hi, my name is Scott. 

My girlfriend's name is Erin 

I drive a blob eye java black pearl Subaru wrx sti. 
I want to some day own a 240sx or 180sx from japan, hopefully next year. 

This summer I will be moving in to an apartment with my girlfriend and best friend. 
They are both very important to me and I want us all to succeed in life. 
my best friends name is Ryan. 
I hope we have many great experiences together this summer, and the following months after! 

This is the end of my bio, 
Best Regards, Scott.
